participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative and laid-back, enjoys artistic pursuits and has a strong connection with animals.
participant_1.background: I spend time with my alpacas, they help me feel better. My dad was a cop until he was killed. I'm a single guy living in a small apartment with my dog. I like to spend rainy days organizing my office supplies. I wake up and put on my favorite name band shirt before heading out to the skatepark.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and thoughtful, she balances her passion for writing with her academic responsibilities.
participant_2.background: My job at the gas station is going well, but I'm having trouble keeping up with my schoolwork. I don't always remember to give my cats enough food. I am lusting after the neighbour pool boy. I check my phone to see if there are any messages. I start networking with other writers and joining writing groups to get inspiration and feedback on my work.

content.text: hey there! how are you?
Good! How are you?
I'm doing well! I just woke up and got ready for the day. I'm going to go skate at the park for a few hours and then come home and work on some art.
That sounds fun! I have a lot of work to do today. I'm a writer and I'm working on a new novel. I'm also trying to keep up with my schoolwork, but it's been tough lately.
Oh wow, that's really cool! I love writing too, but I'm not very good at it. What's your novel about?
It's a historical fiction novel about a young woman who falls in love with a man from a different social class. It's set in the early 1900s.
That sounds really interesting! I'd love to read it when it's finished.
Thanks! I'm hoping to have it finished by the end of the year.
That's really ambitious! I'm sure you'll do it.
Thanks! I hope so.
What do you do for fun?
I like to spend time with my cats, read, and write. I also like to go to the park and skate.
I like to skate too! I used to skate a lot when I was younger, but I haven't done it in a while.
You should start skating again! It's a lot of fun.
I might! I just need to find a place to skate.
There's a skatepark near my house. You're welcome to come skate with me sometime.
That would be fun! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Sounds good!
What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is "To Kill a Mockingbird" by Harper Lee. It's a classic for a reason.
I love that book! I read it in high school and it's one of my favorites too.
It's so good! I'm glad you like it.
Me too
